title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
description: Small symmetrical figure with leaf curving from lower end closely set at right angles, in stie mauve and blue voided cut and uncut velvet on cream cloth ground originally run through with metal strips.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century.
late 16th–early 17th century. Medium: silk, metallic
Technique: velvet. Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf. 1954-167-20-a.
